version_description:
Bank muscat is pleased to inform of launch of mBanking phase 3 further enhanced with the following services -

New Financial services -

1. Instant Bill payments for Omantel, OOredoo and OIFC
2. Omantel top ups
3. International fund transfer via Swift
4. Speed Transfer to Philippines
5. Speed Transfer to Srilanka
6. Asset Management
7. Zakat Calculator / Payment

Non-Financial services -

1. Revised branding
2. Loan Statements
3. Loan Calculator
4. Registration is accepted for any local & international mobile number
5. Push notifications
6. Customer profile views
7. Request of Statement through email
8. Accepting request for changing email & mobile number – These will be update on an offline basis.

New Service has been added to “Disable/ Enable Debit card for International usage for ATMs and POS”. This service will help the customer to secure their Debit card from any fraudulent transactions. Kindly note, by default the debit card are enabled for usage in all the countries. These services are as follows -

· Disable International Card Usage Request
· Enable International Card Usage Request for a specific country
· View/ Delete requests

The disabling and enabling of the Card usage shall not impact the ecommerce transactions.

New Services has been added and applied security patches to avoid fraudulent activities. The new services will help you to update your Mobile Number and Email Id instantly. These services are
· Mobile Number Update
· Email Id Update

New Services has been added and applied security patches to avoid fraudulent activities. The new services will help you to update your Mobile Number and Email Id instantly. These services are
· Mobile Number Update
· Email Id Update

A new feature introduced to transfer.
1. Add money to bm wallet

New features introduced to transfer
1. Speed transfer to Bangladesh
2. Speed transfer to Pakistan

And the introduction for Speed Transfer to India - New online Transfer in seconds as IMPS, RTGS and NEFT.
iOS 11 Enhancements.

1.Bug fixes
2.Updated FAQ

1. Bug Fixes
2. Prepaid Card Services

1. Addition of Marketing Offers
2. Bug fixes & enhancements in security features

1. Security Enhancement with dual authentication during Registration and Activation.
2. Bug Fixes.
Bug  Fixes.

1. New Feature for login using Biometric (Touch ID /Face ID)
2. Online Utility Bill payment of ONIEC
3. Additional Utility billers with OIFC
4. View Beneficiary name while adding new beneficiary for within bank muscat funds transfer
5. iPhone X Compatibility
6. Notifications bug fixes

1. PASI payments in Bill Payment Section
2. Minor Bug fixes

1. Bug Fixes
2. Prepaid Card Services

- Mobile payments can now be made using mobile number, alias, or scanning a QR code.
- Paying to merchants is now available by scanning the QR code.
- Collecting payments using mobile number or alias.
- Accept payment requests … and more
